name: AWON GOLDING MILLINERY™ - JESSICA
description:
象牙色硬絲緞的巨型蝴蝶結以鋸齒形羽毛點綴，溫文儒雅。
Ivory duchess satin soft bow with hackle feathers.   

HANDMADE IN UK

[關於Awon Golding Millinery的產品付運及製作時間] 

所有Awon Golding Millinery的產品都是在接到訂單後人手製作，產品將會在訂單發出及確認後約3週寄出。香港地區使用本地速遞服務(運送時間約2-3工作天)而中國及澳門地區會使用優先國際郵遞在(運送時間約5-10工作天）。 其他國家的訂單請在下訂單前跟我們聯繫 info@tietheknots.hk。產品付運時間是我們的最佳估計，並不包括運送時間。 除非在購買之前跟我們作出安排，生產時間只是我們最佳預算，並不能保證確實的付運時間。 此外，由於所有Awon Golding Millinery的產品都是人手製作，所以每個產品可能有輕微差異。 我們強烈建議客人盡量預早訂購以確保你能夠在充足的時間下收到相關產品。 

[SHIPPING, PRODUCTION TURNAROUND ON AWON GOLDING MILLINERY PRODUCTS] 

All Awon Golding Millinery products are hand created when order and will ship your order in about 3 weeks after purchase and confirm using local courier for orders within Hong Kong (2-3 days in transit) or Priority International shipping for orders within China & Macau (5-10 business days in transit). For all other countries, please contact us before placing order at info@tietheknots.hk. The turnaround time is our best estimate and does not include shipping times. Unless arranged prior to purchase, production times are our best estimates and not guaranteed. Additionally, there may be slight differences from piece to piece as everything is handmade. We highly recommend ordering your piece(s) sooner rather than later to ensure that you will receive in plenty of time.

象牙色的硬絲緞立體蝴蝶結點綴在蕾絲的小禮帽，可以戴在頭的前端，或戴著頭後面像一個小盒子，優雅時尚。

description:
